sentences.english: It's inexplicable why he should have fallen love with such a shrewd and insolent woman.
sentences.chinese: 不知道他爲什麼會愛上這樣一個刁蠻的女人。

sentences.english: It is known to all that she is a shrewd and obstinate girl.
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道她是一個刁蠻的丫頭。

sentences.english: Wilfulness is the stumbling block in a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 任性，刁蠻是婚姻的絆腳石。

sentences.english: She enable Wong Yung to be a clever and unruly, it's lively because of Barbara Yung.
sentences.chinese: 她，把黃蓉的冰雪聰明以及刁蠻任性的性格演得生動。

definition: to rival sb for the affection of a man or woman/to be jealous of a rival in a love affair
lit. find a stage, put on a comedy (idiom); to join in the fun/to play along according to local conditions
to fight openly and maneuver covertly (idiom)
fig. restless, because of fear or strong emotions
to make a clear difference between what one likes and what one hates/to have well-defined likes and dislikes
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
to amuse oneself/to play with/to tease
heart/intention/one's inclination/state of mind/to have the heart for sth/mood
completely lacking any feeling or sense of justice (idiom); cold and ruthless
